content:
From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
Find a dedicated session now in rev.
1d8a79aa2a99cd24f37df4db25bec313b513e8bc

The next step is to collect various material, primarily concerning
multisets and permutations, into that session and formulate a small guide.

When iterating over the depending AFP entries I got the impression that
AFP entries on combinatorics have a well-defined scope already, so it is
not unlikely that in the long run that session in the distribution could
disperse into Library and AFP.

Cheers,
Florian
OpenPGP_signature
